last_episode_to_air.name: This Soccer Mom Sizzles
last_episode_to_air.overview: A stay-at-home mother of three competes in culinary contests against top chefs. Celebrity foodie Marcel Vigneron guest stars.

name: Food Fighters
overview: The table is set for the ultimate culinary clash in this one part cooking competition, one part game show. Host Adam Richman ("Man v. Food") will give homegrown amateur cooks the chance to test their skills against professional chefs. Every down-home cook has that one signature dish or secret family recipe that always gains favor with friends and family. Now, imagine going head-to-head in the kitchen against five professional chefs, who try to cook your specialty dish even better than you in the hopes of winning over a dinner party made up of the American public. With each savored victory, the cash prize gets bigger and bigger as the home cooks rise to every challenge and outcook the professional chefs. Think you've got what it takes to serve up the competition?

episodes.name: Elisha Joyce
episodes.overview: In the series premiere, home cook Elisha Joyce puts her signature recipes to the test against five pro chefs - including Lorena Garcia!

episodes.name: Kena Peay
episodes.overview: A single and unemployed home chef competes against culinary professionals -- including Cat Cora.

episodes.name: Annie Smith
episodes.overview: Home cook Annie Smith battles five pro chefs in hopes of winning enough money to provide her daughter with a speech-generating device!

episodes.name: Nick Evans
episodes.overview: IT manager and home cook from Denver, Nick Evans, puts his best recipes to the test against five pro chefs -including Duff Goldman.

episodes.name: Cortney Anderson-Sanford
episodes.overview: Home cook Cortney Anderson-Sanford puts her best recipes to the test against five professional chefs, including Lorena Garcia, in an attempt to win $100,000.

episodes.name: Jon Coombs
episodes.overview: An Army sergeant competes against culinary professionals -- including chef Cat Cora.

episodes.name: Melissa Clinton
episodes.overview: A high-school teacher faces off against notable culinarians. Appearing: chef Jet Tila.

episodes.name: Jim Stark
episodes.overview: A retired fashion executive from California competes against professional culinarians in the Season 1 finale. Chef Elizabeth Falkner guest stars.

episodes.name: I'm Bringing the Spice
episodes.overview: Season 2 of the culinary competition series opens. Here, a convention reporter from Orlando, Fla., competes against professional chefs, including Antonia Lofaso. Adam Richman hosts.

episodes.name: You're in the Big Leagues Now
This Kid's Got Moves
episodes.overview: A 14-year-old boy competes against culinary experts. Appearing: celebrity chef Rocco DiSpirito.

episodes.name: This Cheerleader's Got Game
episodes.overview: A former NFL cheerleader from California participates in a food fight against professional chefs. Appearing: celebrity chef Nadia G.

episodes.overview: A mother from Dallas competes against culinary experts, including chef Brian Malarkey, in hope of winning $100,000.

episodes.name: The Lawyer Raises the Bar
episodes.overview: A California law student showcases his signature dishes and competes against professional chefs. Appearing: chef Fabio Viviani.

episodes.name: Whiz Kid in the Kitchen
episodes.overview: A 12-year-old girl competes in culinary battles against top chefs. Pastry chef Duff Goldman is featured.

episodes.overview: A Virginia father of four engages in culinary showdowns with master foodies. Appearing: chef Aaron McCargo.
